channel.title: 9/11 Quotes
channel.description:
"The fact that they would continue and perpetuate the lie, suggests that we need a FULL investigation of what is going on and what is demonstrably an incompetent and what is worse,a deceitful Federal Government."
Lou Dobbs CNN
now know well that the disastrous attack has been planned and realized from the CIA American and the Mossad with the aid of the Zionist world in order to put under accusation the Arabic Countries and in order to induce the western powers to take part ... in Iraq [and] Afghanistan.
Francesco Cossiga (former Italian President, quoted in Italy's largest newspaper)
In war, truth is the first casualty.
Aeschylus
There were lots of warnings.
Donald Rumsfeld
No warnings
Ari Fleischer-Whitehouse Spokesman
" Do we wanna think about scrambling an aircraft? " " Oooh, God I don't know. " " That's a decision somebody's gonna have to make probably in the next 10 minutes. " " Uh, yeah, you know, everybody just left the room. "
[b]Actual[/b] dialog from the 9/11 commission report.
"but overall, the American journalism was cowed, and intimidated by the this massive flag-sucking, this patriotic, orgy..."
Hunter Thompson

item.title: 9/11 Quotes
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Communism>Monarchy>democracy.

Bush is now crapping that Iran has nucluear (sp?) weapons, while the investigators (same ones that [b]didnt[b] find WMD’s in Iraq) state that there aren’t any. That was quite off-topic, but anyways, the government probably knew of a threath, but did nothing about it.

Read full topic

item.title: 9/11 Quotes
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I have respect for Maddox, he’s not afraid to spread his mind to everybody in the world. I’ve been reading those pages for at least 3 years now and I’ve only found a few things I disagree with. Some of his post there are hilarious and some are serious. To say he had a bad childhood and all he does is post on his website doesn’t make him sad, to believe he is right doesn’t mean he’s sad either. He speaks his mind, simple as that.

Read full topic

item.title: 9/11 Quotes
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Divine-Devil:

And that guy had a bad childhood if all he does it post stuff on his website, and he thinks hes always right? Kinda sad.

He actually is amazing funny, he has a full time job, and posts about once every 3 months. And he still gets 80 visits a minute, and 200 million visits overall. That’s akin to dissing Bill Gates. All said and done, he’s still cooler and richer than you will ever be.

Read full topic

Ugh, When I posted my research on 9/11 and other sources… I got flamed? Blah, Anyways, 9/11 was planned.

The END.

And that guy had a bad childhood if all he does it post stuff on his website, and he thinks hes always right? Kinda sad.
